name: aquamin-e2e
description: E2E testing for the aquamin theme

scripts.start: npm run theme:clean && npm run theme:build && npm run env:start && npm run theme:seed && npm run wpcli && npm run theme:build && npm run test:e2e && echo 'Happy testing!'
scripts.stop: npm run env:stop && echo 'Thanks for stopping by!'
scripts.env:start: wp-env start && wp-env run tests-cli wp theme activate aquamin
scripts.wpcli:block: wp-env run tests-cli wp aquamin block create --block_title='My Block WP-CLI' --block_slug='my-block-wpcli' --block_dir='my-block-wpcli' --block_namespace='MyBlockWPCLI' --block_desc='The My Block WP-CLI block.' --has_inner_block --inner_block_title='My Block WP-CLI Item' --inner_block_slug='my-block-wpcli-item' --inner_block_dir='my-block-wpcli-item' --inner_block_namespace='MyBlockWPCLIItem' --inner_block_desc='The My Block WP-CLI Item inner block.' --has_js --is_dynamic='n'
scripts.wpcli:block:dynamic: wp-env run tests-cli wp aquamin block create --block_title='My Block WP-CLI Dynamic' --block_slug='my-block-wpcli-dynamic' --block_dir='my-block-wpcli-dynamic' --block_namespace='MyBlockWPCLIDynamic' --block_desc='The My Block WP-CLI Dynamic block.' --has_js --is_dynamic
scripts.wpcli:component: wp-env run tests-cli wp aquamin component create --component_title='My Component WP-CLI' --component_slug='my-component-wpcli' --component_dir='my-component-wpcli' --has_template_part='my-component-wpcli' --has_view_js --has_theme_js --has_view_css --has_theme_css --has_block_editor_css --has_hooks
scripts.wpcli: npm run wpcli:block && npm run wpcli:block:dynamic && npm run wpcli:component
